title: Andhra Pradesh CM lays foundation, launches power projects worth Rs 6,600 cr
description: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Y S Jagan Mohan Reddy inaugurated and initiated the construction of several power projects worth Rs 6,600 crore. Virtually inaugurating two solar power projects valued at Rs 3,400 crore in Kadapa and Anantapur, Reddy also laid the foundation for 16 power substations costing Rs 2,479 crore and inaugurated 12 substations worth Rs 620 crore.
